path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Nord Advisory Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Improper management of userUnderlyingBalance value may lead to denial of service for a user
findings.description: The _deposit() function updates userUnderlyingBalance with stableTokenAmount and restricts deposits beyond maxDepositCap, but during withdrawal, subtracting the minimum of userUnderlyingBalance and underlyingAmountToWithdraw from userUnderlyingBalance may leave a leftover balance, leading to unintended DoS for a user.
